text: musata api ratri tihak pratigna dunimu. tavada api eya (dina) dahayakin purna kalemu. e anuva ohuge paramadhipatige niscita kalaya ratri hatalihak lesa sampurna viya. mage samuhaya atara ma venuven numba niyojanaya karanu. tavada vidhimat karanu. tavada numba kalahakaringe manga anugamanaya nokaranu yÃ¦yi musa ohuge sahodara harunta kiveya
